## About Abinash Senapati is a tech-enthusiast, an amateur sketch artist, and an open-source-coding enthusiast. A boy from the city of Bhubaneswar. He is currently majoring in Electronics and Electrical Communication Engineering in Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur. He was the Secretary Technology, Nehru Hall of Residence, IIT Kharagpur for the academic session 2016-17. He is currently a developer at coala.io and a member of Aspects team of coala. He is an explorer who constantly tries to extend his comfort-zone to different sectors everyday............. Wanna know more !!! Believe me..... It just gets more and more awesome as you just scroll down !!!! To get updates of all the cool stuffs I do, follow me!!!!
